title: Quarantine Ending For 43 People In Contact With U.S. Ebola Victim
teaser: Host Audie Cornish speaks to NPR's Nell Greenfieldboyce about the end of the 21-day monitoring period for the 43 people who had come into contact with Ebola victim Thomas Eric Duncan.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
